page.title: 08A Holiday in 1985
page.content: On Tuesday the 28th of May I woke up at 0700 I put on my pants,socks, vest,dress and cardigan.Then I went downstairs to have my breakfast.I had coco pops and pure fruit juice and salami with bread.When I had finished my breakfast I played with my sisters until my dad had finished his breakfast.Then we went to get some bricks to put underneath the rabbit hutch that my dad had made.Afterwards we went to buy some sawdust to put inside the rabbit hutch.When we returned we put the bricks underneath the hutch and sprinkled sawdust in it. Then my Mum and I went to buy a rabbit.I chose a himalayan rabbit.On the way home I decided to call it Penny.For the rest of the day I kept taking her in out of her hutch for a cuddle.I went to bed at 2030.
